entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Alexandria
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 08:25 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Moose Creek Wells 10:00 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023
Temperature: -2.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.5 kPa rising
Humidity: 95 %
Wind Chill: -4
Dewpoint: -3.3°C
Wind: NNW 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy. Temperature falling to minus 3 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 10 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature falling to minus 3 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming north 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023
